# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(unittester-core-bus)


target_compile_options(unittester-core-bus PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
  -Wparentheses
  -Wno-logical-op-parentheses
  -Wno-bitwise-op-parentheses
)

target_link_libraries(unittester-core-bus PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  yt-yt-core
  yt-core-test_framework
  cpp-testing-common
  library-cpp-resource
)

target_allocator(unittester-core-bus
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)

target_link_options(unittester-core-bus PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(unittester-core-bus PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/bus_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/ssl_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/e1649386c08e7354b6a0ab189e536d57.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  unittester-core-bus
  COMMAND
  unittester-core-bus
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-core-bus
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-core-bus
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

resources(unittester-core-bus
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/e1649386c08e7354b6a0ab189e536d57.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/ca.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/ca_ec.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/ca_with_ip_in_san.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/cert.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/cert_ec.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/cert_with_ip_in_san.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/key.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/key_ec.pem
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/core/bus/unittests/testdata/key_with_ip_in_san.pem
  KEYS
  /testdata/ca.pem
  /testdata/ca_ec.pem
  /testdata/ca_with_ip_in_san.pem
  /testdata/cert.pem
  /testdata/cert_ec.pem
  /testdata/cert_with_ip_in_san.pem
  /testdata/key.pem
  /testdata/key_ec.pem
  /testdata/key_with_ip_in_san.pem
  OPTS
)

vcs_info(unittester-core-bus)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-core-bus
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
